channel.title: Dialogue Problem (The Frames)

item.title: Dialogue Problem (The Frames)
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

Unlike yourself, I’ll help you out. Change that case to this

case 1209:
            sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 4902);
            sendFrame126("", 4903);
            sendFrame126("", 4904);
            sendFrame126("", 4905);
            sendFrame126("", 4906);
            sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4901);
            sendFrame164(4900);
            NpcDialogueSend = true;
            break;

See the 4 empty “” lines? Inbetween the “” put a line of text in. There.

Enjoy.

Read full topic

item.title: Dialogue Problem (The Frames)
item.dc:creator: @LeScape_Pk LeScape Pk
item.description:
@LeScape_Pk wrote:

Alright, I have this as an example of an N.P.C. talking

case 1209:
				sendFrame200(4883, 591);
				sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 4884);
				sendFrame126("I have some beginning axes for sale.", 4885);
				sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4883);
				sendFrame164(4882);
				NpcDialogueSend = true;
				break;

All fine an dandy, works fine; but I can only have the N.P.C. speak one line, how would I have it to like in runescape, where the N.P.C. has 3 or 4 lines to speak on. This would save me some time. Thanks.

Read full topic
